name: Terra Forma 5
description:
Sci-fi / Cyber punk inspired game about a girl who has visions of impending doom.

Written and designed by Ken Copeland and JohnHenry Clark with the art of Paul Kollath, Ken Copeland and myself.  Made in 24 hours for the IGDA and Voxelles Spooky Game Jam at the 2112 incubator.

Made using Fungus.
